package.name: linux
package.unpack: major=` echo $PKGVERSION | awk -F '.' '{print $1}' ` minor=` echo $PKGVERSION | awk -F '.' '{print $2}' ` unxz -c ${SRCDIR}/linux-${major}.${minor}.tar.xz | tar xf -
package.patch: major=` echo $PKGVERSION | awk -F '.' '{print $1}' ` minor=` echo $PKGVERSION | awk -F '.' '{print $2}' ` cd linux-${major}.${minor} [ -f ${SRCDIR}/patch-${PKGVERSION}.xz ] && unxz -c ${SRCDIR}/patch-${PKGVERSION}.xz | patch -p1 cp -v ${SRCDIR}/lesslinux-fblogo-20100922.ppm drivers/video/logo/logo_linux_clut224.ppm cp -v ${SRCDIR}/config-3.16-lesslinux-20140815-1425 .config echo 'CONFIG_ACPI_PROCFS_POWER=y' >> .config cd .. mv linux-${major}.${minor} linux-${PKGVERSION}
package.build: cd linux-${PKGVERSION} yes '' | make oldconfig make clean if [ -n "$DISTCC_POTENTIAL_HOSTS" ] ; then jobcount=` expr $DISTCC_HOSTCOUNT '*' 3 ` pump make -j $jobcount CC="distcc gcc" CXX="distcc g++" pump make -j $jobcount bzImage CC="distcc gcc" CXX="distcc g++" else make -j 4 make -j 4 bzImage fi
